mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_id, contents, location, a.created_at, a.writer_user_id, uid AS writerUid, nick_name AS writerNickName, pic AS writerPic, c.feed_id IS NOT NULL AS isLike FROM feed a JOIN user b ON a.writer_user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like c ON a.feed_id = c.feed_id AND c.user_id = #{signedUserId} ORDER BY a.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
